iana.encoding_considerations:
Binary encoding of a PFCP message (as defined in 3GPP TS 29.244), 
   including PFCP headers and not including IP and UDP headers.

Security considerations: The information transported in this MIME 
   media type does not include active or executable content.

Interoperability considerations: The MIME type allows 
   interoperability between applications which need to exchange PFCP 
   information in mobile networks.

   information in mobile networks.

interoperability between applications which need to exchange PFCP

iana.template_text:
(registered 2021-04-09, last updated 2021-04-09)

Media type name: application

Media subtype name: vnd.3gpp.pfcp

Required parameters: N/A

Optional parameters: N/A

Encoding considerations: binary

   Binary encoding of a PFCP message (as defined in 3GPP TS 29.244), 
   including PFCP headers and not including IP and UDP headers.

Security considerations: The information transported in this MIME 
   media type does not include active or executable content.

Interoperability considerations: The MIME type allows 
   interoperability between applications which need to exchange PFCP 
   information in mobile networks.

Published specification: 

   3GPP TS 29.502 v15.9.0
   (http://www.3gpp.org/ftp/Specs/html-info/29502.htm)

Applications which use this media: Applications that manipulate PFCP 
   payloads

Fragment identifier considerations: N/A

Restrictions on usage: N/A

Additional information:

   1. Deprecated alias names for this type: N/A
   2. Magic number(s): N/A
   3. File extension(s): N/A
   4. Macintosh file type code: N/A
   5. Object Identifiers: N/A

General Comments: N/A

Person to contact for further information:

   1. Name: Bruno Landais
   2. Email: bruno.landais&nokia.com

Intended usage: Common

   The exchange of PFCP payloads for session management is a very 
   common service in mobile networks.

Author/Change controller: 3GPP

   3GPP contact: Lionel Morand <lionel.morand&orange.com>
